name: Marlon Mueller
seeking: Seeks JV partners who can facilitate collaborative growth and introduce new strategic partnership opportunities. Limited data suggests openness to working with aligned service providers or business professionals in complementary niches.
what_you_do: Marlon Mueller is an investor, speaker, 3-time bestselling author, mentor and co-founder of Your Wealth Resource. His goal is to help others through his experiences in wealth creation and protection using life insurance banking, real estate and syndication and legacy planning.
signature_programs: Messy Messages from Millionaires: 52+ Global Entrepreneurs from Startup to $uccess, Turning Points 2, Your Relationship Roadmap
business_focus: Guiding purpose-driven individuals to uncover their God-given identity, transform their mindset, and build a Kingdom-centered wealth system that leaves a lasting legacy.
service_provided: wealth creation, wealth protection, life insurance banking, real estate, syndication, legacy planning
